comment.author: 69587809@N05
comment._content: The more of these National Library of Scotland pictures of Queen Mary one sees the greater grows the admiration for her.  Yet, as Thomas Kettle wrote, many of the soldiers didn't fight for love of King or Country but for a dream born in a herdsman's shed.  What a sad and terrible war it was.

comment.author: 79516808@N03
comment._content: I was wondering "which" Queen she was, thank you for the detail :)
